chapter.title: Pious People of the World
chapter.subtitle: חסדי עמות העלם - Chasidei Umot haOlam
chapter.para: Chassidei umot haOlam have animal souls that emanate from klipat nogah; the same place where bnei Yisrael animal souls originate.

Chassidei umot haOlam are not attached to bnei Yisrael like gerim. They are still physically still among their host nation and are spritually held hostage(see Rebbe's Sichot on this matter). Spiritually, they are attached to klal Yisrael, but not physically and do not gain those blessings.

sect1.title: Halacha
sect1.para: Chassidei umot haOlm are the same as keepers of the seven laws of bnei Noach, except they keep the seven laws because haShem gave them via Moshe and Torah. There is a disagreement if it's because the seven are in Torah or if it's because Moshe received and gave them.
